title: Season rewards.
body:
I was (as of today) 14 day suspended because of a reactionary toxicity i take Complete blame (for everyone who is going to start doing the "you deserve it" in comments).

Can i still get season rewards if i hit solo/duo Gold 5?

replies.body: [**Getting a ban or 7 days or longer after 8/22 will make you ineligible for season rewards**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068), so if you just got this one it doesn't sound like you'll be getting the rewards this season.
awww... it's okay. i have like a month on this one i should be able to smurf to gold 5 on an alt! i just gotta stop being reactionary toxic to people who int on purpose.

Over my hundreds of games in Ranked this season alone, I can count on my fingers the number of times someone actually "int'ed on purpose" (which is redundant, if it's intentional, it's necessarily on purpose).

People play to win. They don't spend 20+ minutes in a game just to piss 4 other people off. Sometimes they are bad, they feed, and they make stupid mistakes, and it's infuriating watching them do all that. But they don't int, no.
Props for trying to keep toxicity under wraps! A good method is to always remember how much better it feels to hit that report button than to fight back with them!
